= Introduction =

This page has operating instructions for the Atari 5200 core.

= Links =
  * [http://www.scrameta.net/autobuild/ Core binaries]
  
= Installation =

Copy the `*`.rbf file to the root of an SD card.

Create the following sub-folders (note the missing i):
 * /atar5200/
 * /atar5200/rom/
 * /atar5200/user/

Copy an image of the Atari5200 ROM into the /rom/ folder, then rename it to *5200.rom*.

Copy games into the /user/ folder.
